overview:
Omair Aasim is the Co-founder of Swipe - an easy way to tell people what you want to buy and find what others are buying in your area

Prior to Swipe, Omair worked as a Senior Developer at JP Morgan Chase. At JP Morgan, Omair was part of the team that built and maintained the banks secure payment gateway. Previously Omair build and ran several successful web applications including a marketplace for freelance developers, an e-commerce portal, a vertical search engines and an online music portal.

Omair has a Masters Degree in Computer Science from the University of Houston.
